markdownRemark.html: I will be giving a presentation at May's JAXDUG meeting on the ASP .NET MVC framework. The MVC framework is modern web application framework for .NET that shares many popular features with other popular frameworks such as Ruby on Rails, DJango, Grails and ColdBox.

frontmatter.title: ASP .NET MVC framework presentation at May 5th JAXDUG meeting
ASP.NET MVC Presentation Tonight at JaxDug User Group
